Columns.Description: The time (UTC) at which this event was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The category of this log for this events it will be Query
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: Time (UTC) at which this command started
Columns.Name: StartedOn

Columns.Description: Time (UTC) at which this command ended
Columns.Name: LastUpdatedOn

Columns.Description: The name of the database the command ran on
Columns.Name: DatabaseName

Columns.Description: The State the command ended with
Columns.Name: State

Columns.Description: The user that invoked the query
Columns.Name: User

Columns.Description: The principal that invoked the query
Columns.Name: Principal

Columns.Description: The workload group the query was classified to
Columns.Name: WorkloadGroup

Columns.Description: The text of the invoked query
Columns.Name: Text

Columns.Description: The entity that caused the query to fail. For example, if the query result is too large, the ComponentFault will be 'Client'. If an internal error occured, it will be 'Server'
Columns.Name: ComponentFault

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
